resources.string:
" 1, An expense book is a tool for keeping track of expenses. This app allows you to record all of your financial transactions, whether you earn or spend money"
 
 2. To track your daily expense such as shopping , tickets, daily cash withdrawal, and other. This app will help you to record such things
 
 3. If you are using it as an business account then use track daily inflow and outflow of money within daily business such as salary, item ordered and payment dues

Step 1. long press the entry, you want to edit 
 
 Step 2. Enter the new Fields such as amount and tag of expense
 
 Step 3. Click Sava button to save it otherwise click cancel.

"To create a new expense book follows the following steps:-
 
 Step 1. To create a notebook first click on "+" sign on the bottom right hand side to add a new notebook
 
 Step 2. A dialog open up from the bottom then add notebook name and select date
 
 Note :- Notebook name is mandatory, without name notebook could not be created
 
 Step 3. Click the save button to save the expense book and expense will be created

To delete or rename Expense Book follows the following steps:-
 
 Step 1. Long press the book you wish to delete or rename
 
 Step 2. add the new name or date you wish to add
 
 Step 3. If you wish to delete expense book then press delete button
 
 Step 4. Otherwise, select save if you want to rename it.

To change language of the whole application follow the following steps:-
 
 Step 1. Go to the setting page using the bottom navigation
 
 Step 2. click the "Change Language" button on the setting page
 
 Step 3. Select the language you want to use, currently only two language options are available "Hindi" and "English"

To search for the expense book follow given steps:-
 
 Step 1. Press the search button on the top right hand side of the books page
 
 Step 2. Press Type the name of the notebook you want to search
 
 Note :- if Notebook does not exist then search results will be empty
 Step 3. Return to the home book page by clicking back button
